About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

DREW CARRILLO

I like to learn. I like to push myself. I like getting people excited about things I'm excited about. I like pranks. I like coffee.

Things I didn't make any money at:

Stand up comedy, Internet radio DJ, Podcaster, Red Cross disaster relief volunteer, Marathon runner, Ironman (as in swim, bike, run... not the Avenger).

Things I made money at:

TESLA

Sr Agent, Property and Title

December 2017 - Present

At Tesla, I taught myself to code in order to automate some of the more tedious tasks on the Property and Title team.

Starting with VBA, then later Javascript, I taught myself to write programs to generate contracts, emails and case notes.

SolarCity

Contract Reassignment Agent
November 2015 - December 2017

Starting as a Program Specialist, I worked up through the ranks of Interconnection and finally Contract Reassignment. On the CR team, I wrote contracts, negotiated with buyers and sellers, and worked on processes.

VIA International

Security Project Manager

March 2014 - November 2015

VIA installed high end audio/video for new luxury home builds. I oversaw the security side- alarm systems and cameras. Working with designers, suppliers and installers, I worked the projects from pre-wire to completion.
